pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Language-server extension for OpenSesame and RapunzelCopyright 2020-2023 Sebastiaan Math√¥t (@smathot)## AboutThis extension adds language-server-protocol (LSP) support to Rapunzel (a code editor based on OpenSesame) and OpenSesame. The Language Server protocol is used between a tool (the client) and a language smartness provider (the server) to integrate features like auto complete, go to definition, find all references and alike into the tool- OpenSesame: <https://osdoc.cogsci.nl/>- Rapunzel: <https://rapunzel.cogsci.nl/>- Language servers: <https://langserver.org/>## Dependencies- Required: [pyqode.language_server](https://github.com/open-cogsci/pyqode.language_server)- Optional: See [this page](https://rapunzel.cogsci.nl/manual/language-server) for a list of supported language servers## LicenseThis software is distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License 3.
